Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: A great bar to have a burger with some beers. The service is nice, they made a mistake with our order and they were nice and gave us a free round of drinks. The fries are super nice

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: The beers and the place are great. But this place used to have my favourite burguer in the whole world, the "Italian", it was amazingly good. Now it's gone and the vegetarian version is just sad, and the sides that come with it even more sad. Please bring back the old Italian, i miss it.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Nice place! The waiters are friendly and the beer + food is tasty. They didn't have all beers in the menu and it was a little crowded (probably on the edge of covid rules) so that's one star less. I'd recommend and go again.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: I love this little place but the food is way too expensive. 15 euro for a veg burger on a plate and nothing else. No fries, salad. A shame. They could just be a bit more generous. If you got to Pacific Parc it's cheaper and you get fries.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Very good beer. Food was okay, had a decent size and a slightly special flavour. Service was nor fast nor slow. We were satisfied. I recommend this place for the beers.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Very large choice of beers, nice atmosphere, and tasty food. Yet you better reserve before coming as it can often get overwhelmed.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Lovely Brewery. They have their own selection of beers, including a gluten free one. The staff was friendly, nice atmosphere and great terrace.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: If you're looking to give your teeth a break from chewing, look no further. The spare ribs at this place are so fall-off-the-bone soft that you'll only need your gums to to eat this meat. I barely got to taste the food since I inhaled everything, but I'm sure it was delicious and worth coming to again if I'm ever back in Amsterdam.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: The place is a stylish brewery in the middle of lovely Westerpark- I often come there with friends. They have their own beer and obviously a selection of other drinks. However, the food is rather disappointing. I had pizza, which is priced ‚Ä¶

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Awesome beers, nice burgers an the traditional dutch snacks, what else would I want? The service is great and the staff is very frindly. Don't miss the opportunity of indulging yourself.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: One of my favorite go-to burger place in Amsterdam. I like their burger-beer recommendations.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Good atmosphere would definitely recommend for groups. The bar food is also not bad. Service is great when ordering from servers when using the app service is a little slow.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Nice ambient with very good burgers and special beer.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Love the atmosphere, their own brewed beer (honingblond, the best one) and I actually really enjoyed the vegan burger they have together with the sweet potatoe fries :)

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: It‚Äôs the best hamburger I‚Äôve ever had in Amsterdam ! I had the classic burger, accompanied with sweet potato fries. It was just excellent. The waitress was very nice, who explained to us patiently their speciality. And the outside terrace was perfect for a sunshine day. In short, five stars !

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: It was interesting to see restaurants inside a church.  For someone who hates beer it was actually decent but the food was not good.  Not one of us enjoyed it.  Go for the beer but not the food.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text:
Went there and ordered a burger. Although their menu is almost entirely vegetarian/vegan, we asked if at least the burger contains meat to which the waitress replied that they could add real meat to it.
Then.. We got served a soya burger.. Bummer

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text:
A nice craft beer brewery in the beautiful settings of the Westergasfabrik, not as widely known as other Amsterdam breweries, but because of the quality of the different types of beer, the variety, and the cool pub they will be, imho.
Staff was nice, too.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: The best brewery in town. Great beer food especially flammkuchen with spinach and feta. Try awarded New England IPA if you like a fresh and fruity taste. Pilsner and IPA is also very tasty. If you wanna come with a group you should reserve in advance. Strongly recommended!

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Vegan and veggie Burgers were nice, a bit dry tho and the bread was not that fresh. Beside that the place and the staff are great, good vibe a very friendly!

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: It was the Best veggie burger I ever had 2 years ago, but when I went back recently I was hugely disappointed. Burger was bland, and was quite expensive for what you get.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text:
Absolutely loved this place.

They do quite a big range of beers and a lot of them were great - New England ‚Ä¶

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Nice place to have a drink or snack. Service is a bit slow especially on a busy sunny day. ‚Ä¶

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Burgers are really good, fries are delicious. You can even buy some of their beers to take home !

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Home brewed beers, friendly and knowledgeable staff. Enjoy the friendly atmosphere and cool down on a hot summer day. Don't forget to rate the beers on Untappd!

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: 4 stars for food, quite good, moderate. The beer they make is worth attention, but there is planty of space for improvements, but live music... well, it's all you need for five stars

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Good food, excellent beer (according to my friends).

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: This brewery and venue is lovely. Spacious, great beer, and live jazz on wednesdays. Still haven't tried the food but it all looks great. Will be back!

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Love, love, love this brewery. We visited each time we were in Amsterdam, and loved each time!

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: This busy spot in the center of Westerpark consistently serves the best ribs, and best burgers in Amsterdam. Not a secret: their meats are quality so the flavours of their pork and beef hold up to their assertive, thoughtful sauces.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Good beer, good food. Really nice place.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Nice mood inside - all this brewing stuff in postindustrial localisation makes an impression. Outside is also ok. Wit beer was really nice.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Beer is great, stuff is very friendly the place itself is quite cosy.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Great food and beer. Service was friendly but not particularly fast, still very much worth a visit though.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Great atmosphere, tasty burger, amazing craft beers and live music! All you need for a fantastic evening in great company.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Great spot for some beers with friends! Atmosphere is nice and service was quick! Will definitely be back.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Great atmosphere and good service. Perfect for larger groups.

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
Review Text: Great choice of beer and food. I went there several times and both ribs, burgers, and fish and chips were great. Downside: service. On a busy Friday night they can easily forget your order

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas

Name: Brouwerij Troost Westergas
